entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Eskasoni (First Nations) 10:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: 3.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 2.3°C
Wind: ESE 39 km/h gust 63 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature rising to 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain at times heavy beginning this evening except snow over the Highlands this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Risk of thundershowers overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Rainfall amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southeast 60 gusting to 90 near midnight. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. Temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
